N

NorthPoleWorkshop - Class in cds.java.project.workshop
Implementation of a Santa Claus Workshop located on the North Pole as a thread; this is the point in our program in which all other threads are started; it can be called a control point or a point of orchestration; here is the place where the christmasGiftPipe shared by Santa Claus and the reindeer is created, the place in which all Reindeer, SantaClaus, Toy Factories and the service threads are started, the point in which the lists of factories and reindeer are located; we also have here the instance of the Semaphore used for the synchronization of the Reindeer and ElfStateGetter thread
NorthPoleWorkshop() - Constructor for class cds.java.project.workshop.NorthPoleWorkshop
Constructor of the NorthPoleWorkshop takes no parameters; it creates a new fair binary semaphore, generates a random number (between 2 and 5) of toy factories, sets the total number of reindeer as the number of factories multiplied by 10 (we suppose that there are 10 reindeer on each toy factory); it also creates the lists of reindeer and of factories and the concurrent queue that will represent the communication pipe between Santa Claus and the reindeer; then we generate a new Santa Claus instance, a new elfStateGetter, and use another two methods to create all toy factories and all reindeer and store them in the appropriate lists
notifyFactoryOfMoveDown() - Method in class cds.java.project.actors.ElfWorker
Method that notifies factory after a certain type of move, in this case a move to the south; the current elf position is saved and marked with false in the factory grid because the elf is about to move from that point; using a method from Position2D, a new Position2D object, pointing to the position in the south is generated; this new position is set to true in the grid because the elf will stay there now; finally, the currentPosition field in the elf class is updated
notifyFactoryOfMoveLeft() - Method in class cds.java.project.actors.ElfWorker
Method that notifies factory after a certain type of move, in this case a move to the west; the current elf position is saved and marked with false in the factory grid because the elf is about to move from that point; using a method from Position2D, a new Position2D object, pointing to the position in the west is generated; this new position is set to true in the grid because the elf will stay there now; finally, the currentPosition field in the elf class is updated
notifyFactoryOfMoveRight() - Method in class cds.java.project.actors.ElfWorker
Method that notifies factory after a certain type of move, in this case a move to the east; the current elf position is saved and marked with false in the factory grid because the elf is about to move from that point; using a method from Position2D, a new Position2D object, pointing to the position in the east is generated; this new position is set to true in the grid because the elf will stay there now; finally, the currentPosition field in the elf class is updated
notifyFactoryOfMoveUp() - Method in class cds.java.project.actors.ElfWorker
Method that notifies factory after a certain type of move, in this case a move to the north; the current elf position is saved and marked with false in the factory grid because the elf is about to move from that point; using a method from Position2D, a new Position2D object, pointing to the position in the north is generated; this new position is set to true in the grid because the elf will stay there now; finally, the currentPosition field in the elf class is updated
notifyFactoryOfSpawnPosition() - Method in class cds.java.project.actors.ElfWorker
Method that notifies the assigned factory about the fact that the current elf has produced a toy; the value in the grid corresponding with the elf's new position is properly set to true; method is synchronized so that only one elf can notify factory at a time after creation
numberOfAssignedReindeer - Variable in class cds.java.project.workshop.ToyFactory
Number of reindeer assigned to communicate with the factory in order to take presents from the queue and to pack them
numberOfGifts - Static variable in class cds.java.project.gift.ChristmasGift
Static member that is an internal class counter; it gives the index for the gift (each gift has a number starting from 0; each time we create a gift, it gets an index greater by one from the previous one; initialised when an object is firstly created, trough the use of a static initializer
numberOfKids - Variable in class cds.java.project.actors.SantaClaus
An approximation/estimation of the number of kids for this problem
numberOfReindeer - Variable in class cds.java.project.workshop.NorthPoleWorkshop
Member that holds the total number of reindeer
numberOfToyFactories - Variable in class cds.java.project.workshop.NorthPoleWorkshop
Member that holds the total number of toy factories
numberOfToysProduced - Variable in class cds.java.project.actors.ElfWorker
Every elf will count the number of toys it produced
numberOfWorkingElves - Variable in class cds.java.project.workshop.ToyFactory
Member that counts the number of elves that are currently working in the factory
